activities: Freudenberg IT LP is an Information Technology services provider that designs, implements, optimizes, and monitors IT data center infrastructures to run outsourced hosted applications with databases in reliable, secure environments. Customers are organizations contracting, or otherwise having a services agreement for, Freudenberg IT LP to provide these computer application and associated database hosting services on FIT-maintained servers.  Data in records residing in these databases may include Personal Information received from Customers doing business in the EU. Freudenberg IT LP does not have direct access to this information; it only maintains the computer servers hosting the database applications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line human resources data from Customers is received and stored
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution from the International Centre For Dispute Resolution (American Arbitration Association)
